name: Bogey & Bugs - Fun adventure for kids and toddlers
name_original: Bogey & Bugs - Fun adventure for kids and toddlers
description:
FIRST CHAPTER OF A COLLECTION OF FUN EDUCATIONAL GAMES FOR CHILDREN FROM 3 YEARS OLD.

Enjoy the great trip of our protagonists "Bugs", where they have fun with great adventures living and discovering the value of friendship, generosity and love for the environment, all in search of an ideal place to call "Home" .

Hours and hours of fun in the forest with more than 35 mini-games!
"Bogey & Bugs" is a collection of fun educational games, designed to foster the love of the environment as well as the child's personal development. By means of puzzles, drawings, drag and drop, looking for the couple, among others, the child can discover the journey of our protagonists while developing their digital, visual and auditory abilities.
And all this amusing and discovering the world of his new friends "Bugs".

A perfect opportunity to play with grasshoppers, beetles, ladybugs, fireflies and caterpillars in a fantastic forest, but that serves as an excuse to learn to recognize the insects of nature.

"Bogey & Bugs - Fun adventure for kids and toddlers" contains:
• More than 35 mini-games.
• Incredible cinematic with the history of our protagonists.
• Use of the sensors of the device: games with gyroscope.
• Various levels of difficulty.
• Funny little stories in every mini-game.
• Crowd of fun and friendly insects.
• Simplified and minimalist design, without the need for adult supervision.
